Since, in the longer term, the join Mozilla website is expected to go worldwide, I strongly recommand to read http://rishida.net/blog/?p=100 and follow the ideas regarding how to design name fields in forms that are wishing to go worldwide. One of the idea is to have a field where the user chooses how he/she'd like to be named in mailing-lists. If such a field was added, its value could be used to pre-fill the card name in the "thank you" page.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: bruant.d@gmail.com
